item.title: [PI] Gnome Course Agility ~~Aintaro ~~[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

have you tried making a timer for a specific location and have it give message until that timer ends?

for example: ( I am horrible at java wording so I prefer to use examples sorry )’
-player a mass clicks the log
-player continues anim across log, message is sent stating you cannot go that way.
-after 5 seconds ends
-timer/block ends you are allowed to click the log again.

[hr]

just another thought as well, perhaps some sort of clipping would help solve this issue?

Read full topic

@mr_rawwrz wrote:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:212: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sM(java.lang.String)
location: class server.model.players.Client
sM(message);
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:227: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sM(java.lang.String)
location: class server.model.players.Client
sM(message);
^

Any ideas on what i did wrong? :([/quote]

I got an error like this as well. All i did to fix mine was change the “sM” to “sendMessage”

so it will look like “sendMessage(message);”

can’t really help you on any others as didnt get any others, and am fair new at [pi] coding :S
